title: Wimal’s ‘Garu Kathanayaka Thumani’ presents to President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) ‘Garu Kathanayaka Thumani’, a book that includes all the speeches delivered in the parliament by Mr Wimal Weerawansa MP was presented to President Mahinda Rajapaksa this afternoon on 24th February….
